meeting_request.purpose: Frustrated and unsure of my ability to succeed in my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Monica, a second-year math major. I’ve taken a lot of math courses, both core and elective, and I’ve really enjoyed them all. I’ve even been able to earn high grades, but now I feel like I’m falling behind and not really understanding what I’m doing wrong. I’m still in a major that requires a lot of math, and I’m not sure if I should be trying to major in math or if I should be switching to something else. I’m also involved in a few math-focused clubs and trying to connect with the community, but I feel overwhelmed by all the material and feel like I’m not doing enough to succeed.
